title: I got championship zed when I bought championship riven
body:
It is as the title suggest, I bought championship riven 2016 and after i bought it a screen popped up saying I got championship zed for free. I have no idea why, I'm not complaining but i cant find a reason why this happened.

Edit: After checking my purchase history it appears I was actually charged for championship zed despite me not clicking on the option to buy him, I have no clue what happened at this point.

replies.body: I'm not aware of any issues like this with the store, and the selections appears to be unlocking the intended items.  It looks like you purchased a bundle so you received most of the skins anyway at the flexible bundle price.  If you'd like more context, feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can give you the scoop.  Hope that helps!
